main: ^Okie, ye know how I said there's some mean Mother Hubbards out fer blood? Well, these'd be some of 'em!
Choice: ^Yes, yes, ye can take a swing at 'em this time. But listen up first, 'cause ye need t'know how to scrap in these parts.

c-1: ^A'ight, fine. Ye think know what ye're doing? Go ahead. Skip my spiel. I'm not upset or anything. Either way, good luck.

Tutorial: ^Click n' drag a card towards an enemy to spend that many caps and execute the card's effects on that enemy. Each of yer cards has a number on it; that's its cap cost. In the top right, ye'll see a belt 'o bullets. Those are yer caps, which ye only have a set amount of per turn! Once yer out, ye gotta end yer turn and take yer lumps from whoever's standing opposite ye.

c-1: ^Weren't listening, eh? Ye're lucky I'm patient. Let's go over this again.
